channel.title: Npc dialogue stops?
channel.description: Well on my quest im making the npc dialogue just stops after the 2nd sentence... like the npcdialogue thing just closes.. and u have to retalk to him then it does the same thing over again?

item.title: Npc dialogue stops?
item.dc:creator: @lungxapples lungxapples
item.description:
@lungxapples wrote:

K i fixed most of it but… it says this is a unreachable statement…?

[code=java] case 9158:

			if (NpcDialogue == 2) {
				NpcDialogue = 0;
				NpcDialogueSend = false;
				openUpPinSettings();

if(NpcDialogue == 5){
closeAll();
}
break;
if(NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 9){
closeAll();
}
}
break;[/code]

item.title: Npc dialogue stops?

item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

Delete this part.

if (NpcDialogue == 5){ closeAll(); }
Check the statement where the dialog continues, is is there.
if there is no problem there, then check other closing statements.
There might be same dialog that is closing yours.

item.title: Npc dialogue stops?
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“lungxapples, post:3, topic:342038”]This is what i have for there for what i’m working on.

[code=java]if (NpcDialogue == 4 || NpcDialogue == 6 || NpcDialogue == 7 || NpcDialogue == 8 || NpcDialogue == 11) {

NpcDialogue += 1;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}[/code][/quote]

Why don’t you use a switch statement…?

switch (NpcDialogue) { case 4: case 6: case 7: case 8: case 11: NpcDialogue += 1; NpcDialogueSend = false; break; }

Read full topic

And in case 9158: i have this.

if (NpcDialogue == 5){ closeAll(); } if(NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 9){ closeAll(); } break;

item.title: Npc dialogue stops?
item.dc:creator: @lungxapples lungxapples
item.description:
@lungxapples wrote:

Uhg well i have like everything done for what i need but it’s a quest where it has parts and it saves into your character file… but when you talk to him he says like 2 lines “skips 1 for some reason” then just stops talking and when you talk to him again he says the same exact thing and shuts off.

case 4: talk("Oh dear, oh dear.. The king is going to kill me!", 605); break; case 5: choice("Why? What's the matter?", "Though luck buddy."); break; case 6: talk2("I spilled some cheese on the castle court,","now there are rats everywhere!", 605); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 8: talk2("Say, you look quite bold.", "Could you take care of the rats for me?", 605); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 9: choice("Yeah sure, but what's in it for me?","RATS?!? HELL NO MAN!"); break; case 10: talk2("Come back to me when you have killed 5 rats,","I promise I will reward you greatly!", 605); quest1 = 1; NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 11: talk2("You killed 5 rats? Great!","Please, take this as a sign of gratitude.",605); quest1 = 3; NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

That’s the code for it.

Read full topic
